    • sendData

      public void sendData(byte[] data, boolean forced)
      This is a wrapper for sending data to the device. Implementation of this method is specific to the device.
      Specified by:
      sendData in class AbstractDevice
      Parameters:
      data - Byte array representation of the data to be sent
      forced - Forces sending of data even if current device has send interval limit set

      Returns:

    • validateConnection

      public boolean validateConnection()
      This method provides a wrapper for validation of the connection. Connection is validated based on the device communication implementation.
      Specified by:
      validateConnection in class AbstractDevice
      Returns:
      true if the connection is still active
